documents.document: Last night I dreamt I was with #DrEvil when we were pistol-whipped with a six shooter by #ClintEastwood #Handsome=#Bald
I guess #ClintEastwood and #DrEvil represent warring parts of my personality: the handsome vs. bald sides. #Handsome=#Bald
Most concerns are worrisome, but others are as 'worrisome' as a Summer Breeze

Have you heard about the forger who invented a con, became a conman and went from fooling capable experts to fooling incapable stooges?
Poisonous stepmothers like Maleficent put me in mind of insecticides: they're as poisonous as lead
.@teaching_scholar says religion is a modern science .@sex_goddess says it is an antiquated myth #Religion=#Science #Religion=#Myth
Most intrusions are unanticipated, but others are as 'unanticipated' as Christmas

What if a ðŸ¯, who thought it was Leroy Jethro Gibbs, fell in love with a ðŸ© who thought it was Ellen Ripley? #LeroyJethroGibbs=#EllenRipley
So at first, Leroy the ðŸ¯ fell deeper in love with Ellen the ðŸ© than he ever had with Donald P. Bellisario
ðŸ©ðŸ˜‡ðŸŽ­ðŸ˜ˆðŸŽ´ðŸ¯ (or: ðŸ© cheated on ðŸ¯) But Ellen the ðŸ© fooled around and cheated on Leroy the ðŸ¯.
So Ellen the ðŸ© was a huge disappointment to Leroy the ðŸ¯ when it came to solving crimes
Well, Leroy the no-nonsense ðŸ¯ criticized Ellen the ðŸ© by calling her pushy, mouthy and argumentative
So Ellen the ðŸ© convincingly squirted Leroy the ðŸ¯ with her flamethrower
Well, Leroy the ðŸ¯ got as far away as possible from Ellen the ðŸ© in his yellow Camaro
ðŸ©ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜§â¤ðŸ”œðŸ¯ (or: ðŸ© pined for ðŸ¯) Then Ellen the ðŸ© longed to reconnect with Leroy the ðŸ¯.
So Ellen the ðŸ© pursued Leroy the ðŸ¯ in the Nostromo shuttle all over Olympia and in every corner of the Navy Boat Yards
Well, Leroy the ðŸ¯ hid from Ellen the ðŸ© in the darkest corner of the Navy Boat Yards
But Ellen the ðŸ© found Leroy the ðŸ¯, solving crimes in a dark alley Then Ellen the ðŸ© rescued Leroy the ðŸ¯ from an attack by Alien Xenomorph
ðŸ¯ðŸ’•ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘ŒðŸ© (or: ðŸ¯ mated with ðŸ©) So Leroy the ðŸ¯ selected Ellen the ðŸ© as a mate.
ðŸ©â¤ðŸ¯ (or: ðŸ¯ was loved by ðŸ©) Then Ellen the ðŸ© loved everything about Leroy the ðŸ¯.
So in the end Leroy the ðŸ¯ married Ellen the ðŸ© in the Navy Boat Yards and they honeymooned in Olympia
Thereafter Leroy the ðŸ¯ and Ellen the ðŸ© were utterly inseparable; wherever Ellen the ðŸ© went Leroy the ðŸ¯ was sure to follow. The End

Secretive presidents like Richard Nixon put me in mind of snoops: they're as secretive as Fight Club
When it comes to the appeals they file, some appellants are little better than blamed defendants. #Appellant=#Defendant #Appeal=#Lawsuit
Blamed appellants file unresolved and contentious appeals the way defendants file lawsuits. #Appellant=#Defendant #Appeal=#Lawsuit
Something clicked inside Leroy the ðŸ¯ when Ellen the ðŸ© came along. #LeroyJethroGibbs=#EllenRipley
Crime undermines the justice that underpins freedoms. Love inspires the religions that compete with freedom. Take your pick. #Crime=#Love?
Brave heroes like John Constantine put me in mind of heroes: they're as brave as Piss Christ
What if #StarWars:ThePhantomMenace were about #MartialArts? #JackieChan could be its #DarthMaul: balletic and nimble, yet cheesy too.
If #JackieChan is #DarthMaul in Chinese pyjamas, who in #MartialArts is #QuiGonJinn most like? #StarWars:ThePhantomMenace
Critical historians like Herodotus put me in mind of skeptics: they're as critical as processor speed
"I think I'd make a good author," purred an imaginative cat. "I know all about writing I'll take you under my wing", churred a honey badger.
The honey badger taught the imaginative cat to tell bold stories. But the cat later realized "I've been a great disappointment to my fans".
.@dream_wife says love is an anointed marriage .@fear_demon says it is a cursed evil #Love=#Marriage #Love=#Evil
Precise malcontents like Lee Harvey Oswald put me in mind of chronometers: they're as precise as systematic methods

Rich dictators like Kim Jung-un put me in mind of princes: they're as rich as Bill Gates

Most lions are large, but others are as 'large' as the head of a pin
What if #BackToTheFuture were about #TheInternet? #LarryPage could be its #DocEmmettBrown: pioneering and smart, yet geeky too.
If #LarryPage is like #DocEmmettBrown (pioneering and smart), who in #BackToTheFuture is #MarkZuckerberg most like?
ðŸŒž. Set out to become a trusting brother ðŸŒ¤. Join a fraternity ðŸŒ¬. Realize you've joined a fraternity of skeptical scientists ðŸŒ©. Seek the truth
Lazy singers like Bruce Willis put me in mind of snails: they're as lazy as Tony Danza's right eye
Angel. noun. 1. One who maintains purity. 2. One who combines a rogue's charm with a hero's nobility. #Angel=#Hero #Angel=#Rogue
Fiery interviewers like Megyn Kelly put me in mind of stallions: they're as fiery as a vibrant crimson
"Yes, it is better to be a tsar living in a clean palace than an immigrant living in a grimy ghetto." #ThingsTrumpNeverSaid
I used to think of myself as an energetic cheerleader that tried out for a team. Now I see myself as a sluggish slob that bought sweatpants.
Most kinds of adversity are stressful, but others are as 'stressful' as a walk in the park
ðŸŒ•. Enroll in an academy ðŸŒ–. Become a student ðŸŒ—. Study unimaginative subjects ðŸŒ˜. Turn into a clod ðŸŒ‘. Flunk out of university https://t.co/DKfHFjtuxC
Most individualists are individual, but others are as 'individual' as a Big Mac
How might a reckless maniac become a prudent banker? #Maniac=#Banker
What if reckless maniacs were to recover from their breakdowns, start banks and become prudent bankers? #Maniac=#Banker
One does not simply walk into a Nar Anon meeting about narcotics. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be drug addict that isn't willing to cultivate a chemical dependency on narcotics, you may as well give up narcotics now.
Scheming brokers like Bernard Madoff put me in mind of ministers: they're as scheming as Dick Cheney

Most hurricanes are unpredictable, but others are as 'unpredictable' as the tide
What if a devastating critic isn't serene enough to write wealthy notices? #Critic=#Star
Might this critic attract an admirer and accumulate a star's fortune? #Critic=#Star
.@war_daddy says death is a blessed child .@drought_victim says it is an unfortunate disaster #Death=#Child #Death=#Disaster
Amoral bureaucrats like Adolf Eichmann put me in mind of libertines: they're as amoral as Hannibal Lecter
"I need skilled lovers to help me commit fraud" dooked a furtive weasel "I enjoyed an affair to be a cheater too" grunted a vulgar wild boar
"You can be my adulterer," dooked the weasel. Well, the wild boar was also a vulgar yob and pushed the cheater to commit vulgar fraud.
Most contenders are experienced, but others are as 'experienced' as a child
Musician. noun. An ideologist who would rather form closed ensembles than closed cliques. #Musician=#Ideologist
Most snoops are anonymous, but others are as 'anonymous' as the President of the USA
I call this picture "Rock". I painted it with steadfast warrior-woad-blue, rigid brick-brown and dry sun-orange. #RockRGB https://t.co/jfbaWs8s4F
Camp children like Stewie Griffin put me in mind of queens: they're as camp as Graham Norton listening to Bucks Fizz in a camper
Remember when weapons were carried by courageous warriors? Now, weapons are a power wielded only by fearful demons.
Empire starts the wars that undermine peace. Anarchy causes the chaos that diminishes peace. Take your pick. #Anarchy=#Empire?
Daft musicians like Ozzy Osbourne put me in mind of kooks: they're as daft as a brush
Cowboy. noun. A manly blend of 1 part gun-firing assassin to 1 part whip-wielding dominatrix. #Cowboy=#Dominatrix #Cowboy=#Assassin
Most divorces are contentious, but others are as 'contentious' as a group hug
Not all peasants are lowly, just as not every regent is royal. I'm confused! #MenOfVenn https://t.co/t0xs0iWJZC
#Irony: When the travelers that fly in the clunkiest airplanes also carry the most streamlined suitcases. #Streamlined=#Clunky
Most libraries are quiet, but others are as 'quiet' as a loud vacuum cleaner
Strong is the force in disgruntled wannabes if aspirations they realize. Inherit mansions, they will. Happy lords will they be. https://t.co/LTObGCzk7I
Vain heroines like Scarlett O'Hara put me in mind of boasters: they're as vain as Paris Hilton
#Take5 of the #MostUnhinged things: ðŸ¤”. Psychos ðŸ˜. Mad Women ðŸ˜¥. Nutcases ðŸ˜£. Nut Cases ðŸ™„. Dr. Strangelove #TheColdWar
A patient named @smart_geek asks "I often dream that I lose my wits and become a fool. What does this mean?" #Geek=#Fool
.@smart_geek, you see yourself as smart yet dream of becoming a stupid fool. I suggest you don't acquire some social grace yet, my geek!
Brainwashed actors like Tom Cruise put me in mind of puppets: they're as brainwashed as the Branch Davidians
A marauder asks: "Last night I dreamt I was a gardener, wearing a glove. What could this mean?" #Soft=#Reinforced
Gloves are soft while armors are usually reinforced. You wish that wearing an armor was more like wearing a glove. #Soft=#Reinforced
Most winks are reassuring, but others are as 'reassuring' as George Bush's flight suit
Strong is the force in unethical cheats if amends they make Offer protection, they will Ethical guardians will they be #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
A terrible deer once inherited a regime. A monstrous grizzly then thought "A torturer like me needs a despot like this for my oppression."
"The best despots are dimwitted despots," thought the monstrous grizzly So this torturer decided to perform oppression for the terrible deer
Most beehives are buzzing, but others are as 'buzzing' as tuesday night in Kabul
I call this picture "Stalker". I painted it with relentless Deadpool-red, predatory vampire-fang-white and menacing cloud-grey. #StalkerRGB https://t.co/0I5Bs47CVN
